NK040(thi)031:2: tshogs rdzas kyi steng du ling+ga bcug la /
NK040(thi)031:4: lha gsal mdun du e las brub khung nang //
NK040(thi)031:5: dngos bshams yid kyis rgyal ba'i bstan bshigs pa'i //
NK040(thi)031:6: ma rungs log par byed pa'i ru ta kun //
NK040(thi)031:7: dmigs rten rus pa 'di yi steng du khug /
NK040(thi)031:8: lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrogs dril bu sogs //
NK040(thi)031:9: rno ngar 'bar ba'i mtshon chas gtub gsod brdung //
NK040(thi)031:10: phye mar btang nas rnams shes spar rol la //
NK040(thi)031:11: zag med bdud rtsi gyur pa'i sha khrag rus //
NK040(thi)031:12: dbang po rnam lnga rtsa rgyus yan lag kun //
NK040(thi)031:13: bla ma d+aak+ki chos skyong srung ma rnams //
NK040(thi)031:14: dam can rgya mtsho'i zhal du kha ram kha hi //
NK040(thi)031:15: ma rig 'khrul pa'i gzung 'dzin rang dag nas //
NK040(thi)031:16: rang rig ye shes ngo bo bstan du gsol //
NK040(thi)031:18: zab don tshogs mchod las khol du phyung ba'o //
